title: Mitigated front contact energy barrier for efficient and stable perovskite solar cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,3848-3854
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00316K, Paper
Daoyong Zhang, Biao Li, Pengjie Hang, Jiangsheng Xie, Yuxin Yao, Chenxia Kan, Xuegong Yu, Yiqiang Zhang, Deren Yang
A passivating contact structure was developed to mitigate the front contact energy barrier and hence reduce interface recombination losses in perovskite solar cells. This device structure achieved champion power conversion efficiencies of 25.7%.
